verses.verse: וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> shall be when יָבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come עָלֶ֜יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> And it shall come to pass when all these things הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these הַבְּרָכָה֙ <S%H1293><s%> upon thee the blessing וְהַקְּלָלָ֔ה <S%H7045><s%> and the curse אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have set לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וַהֲשֵׁבֹתָ֙ <S%H7725><s%> thee and thou shalt call אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <S%H3824><s%> [them] to mind בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> among all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which הִדִּיחֲךָ֛ <S%H5080><s%> hath driven יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> whither the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> and you

וְשַׁבְתָּ֞ <S%H7725><s%> And shalt return עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֣ <S%H8085><s%> and shalt obey בְקֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice כְּכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> according to all that I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H1121><s%> thou and thy children בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> and with all thy soul

וְשָׁ֨ב <S%H7725><s%> will turn יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> That then the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁבוּתְךָ֖ <S%H7622><s%> thy captivity וְרִחֲמֶ֑ךָ <S%H7355><s%> and have compassion וְשָׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> upon thee and will return וְקִבֶּצְךָ֙ <S%H6908><s%> and gather מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> thee from all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after הֱפִֽיצְךָ֛ <S%H6327><s%> hath scattered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> whither the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become נִֽדַּחֲךָ֖ <S%H5080><s%> If [any] of thine be driven out בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> unto the outmost הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> [parts] of heaven מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there יְקַבֶּצְךָ֙ <S%H6908><s%> gather יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> from thence will the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there יִקָּחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3947><s%> thee and from thence will he fetch

וֶהֱבִֽיאֲךָ֞ <S%H935><s%> will bring יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H3423><s%> possessed אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> which thy fathers וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> and thou shalt possess וְהֵיטִֽבְךָ֥ <S%H3190><s%> it and he will do thee good וְהִרְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7235><s%> and multiply מֵאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> thee above thy fathers

וּמָ֨ל <S%H4135><s%> will circumcise יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> thine heart וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> and the heart זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> of thy seed לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <S%H157><s%> to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבְךָ֥ <S%H3824><s%> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> and with all thy soul לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> so חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> that thou mayest live

וְנָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> will put יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָל֖וֹת <S%H423><s%> all these curses הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon אֹיְבֶ֥יךָ <S%H341><s%> upon thine enemies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֹׂנְאֶ֖יךָ <S%H8130><s%> and on them that hate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who רְדָפֽוּךָ׃ <S%H7291><s%> thee which persecuted

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you תָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> And thou shalt return וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֖ <S%H8085><s%> and obey בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4687><s%> all his commandments אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> thee this day

וְהוֹתִֽירְךָ֩ <S%H3498><s%> will make thee plenteous יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> in every work יָדֶ֗ךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand בִּפְרִ֨י <S%H6529><s%> in the fruit בִטְנְךָ֜ <S%H990><s%> of thy body וּבִפְרִ֧י <S%H6529><s%> and in the fruit בְהֶמְתְּךָ֛ <S%H929><s%> of thy cattle וּבִפְרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> and in the fruit אַדְמָתְךָ֖ <S%H127><s%> of thy land לְטוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> for good כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> will again יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD לָשׂ֤וּשׂ <S%H7797><s%> rejoice עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over לְט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> over thee for good כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he שָׂ֖שׂ <S%H7797><s%> as he rejoiced עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> over thy fathers

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if תִשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> If thou shalt hearken בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <S%H4687><s%> his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <S%H2708><s%> and his statutes הַכְּתוּבָ֕ה <S%H3789><s%> which are written בְּסֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in this book הַתּוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> if תָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> [and] if thou turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> and with all thy soul פ

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <S%H4687><s%> For this commandment הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נִפְלֵ֥את <S%H6381><s%> it [is] not hidden הִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מִמְּךָ֔ <S%H4480><s%> too וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor רְחֹקָ֖ה <S%H7350><s%> from thee neither [is] it far off הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not בַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> It [is] not in heaven הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> you should לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> that thou shouldest say מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> Who shall go up לָּ֤נוּ הַשָּׁמַ֙יְמָה֙ <S%H8064><s%> for us to heaven וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <S%H3947><s%> and bring לָּ֔נוּ וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <S%H8085><s%> it unto us that we may hear אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <S%H6213><s%> it and do

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> Neither [is] it beyond לַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> you should לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> that thou shouldest say מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> Who shall go לָ֜נוּ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> over הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> the sea וְיִקָּחֶ֣הָ <S%H3947><s%> for us and bring לָּ֔נוּ וְיַשְׁמִעֵ֥נוּ <S%H8085><s%> it unto us that we may hear אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> וְנַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <S%H6213><s%> it and do

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> nigh אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> But הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> But the word מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [is] very בְּפִ֥יךָ <S%H6310><s%> unto thee in thy mouth וּבִֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> and in thy heart לַעֲשֹׂתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6213><s%> that thou mayest do ס

רְאֵ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> See נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have set לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> life וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and good וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּ֖וֶת <S%H4194><s%> and death וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> and evil

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֮ <S%H6680><s%> In that I command הַיּוֹם֒ <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <S%H157><s%> to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to walk בִּדְרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> in his ways וְלִשְׁמֹ֛ר <S%H8104><s%> and to keep מִצְוֹתָ֥יו <S%H4687><s%> his commandments וְחֻקֹּתָ֖יו <S%H2708><s%> and his statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments וְחָיִ֣יתָ <S%H2421><s%> that thou mayest live וְרָבִ֔יתָ <S%H7235><s%> and multiply וּבֵֽרַכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִפְנֶ֥ה <S%H6437><s%> turn away לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> But if thine heart וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and you will not תִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> so that thou wilt not hear וְנִדַּחְתָּ֗ <S%H5080><s%> but shalt be drawn away וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֛יתָ <S%H7812><s%> and worship לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> other וַעֲבַדְתָּֽם׃ <S%H5647><s%> and serve
